name: part_012
file: tmp_【#myth4EVER】hololive English -Myth- 4th Anniversary Concert： The Show Goes On! [CDljbqawDkw]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_012.mov

scenes.description: The final moments of the song 'Connect the World' performed by hololive English -Myth-.
Takanashi Kiara announces the 4th Anniversary merchandise for hololive English -Myth-.

subtitles.original: Carry on
subtitles.english: Carry on

subtitles.original: Starting now
subtitles.english: Starting now

subtitles.original: Setting hearts in motion
subtitles.english: Setting hearts in motion

subtitles.original: Connecting all of the world
subtitles.english: Connecting all of the world

subtitles.original: Yay! Kikkeriki, everyone!
subtitles.english: Yay! Kikkeriki, everyone!

subtitles.original: Did you enjoy the hololive English -Myth- 4th Anniversary Live:
subtitles.english: Did you enjoy the hololive English -Myth- 4th Anniversary Live:

subtitles.original: "The Show Goes On"?
subtitles.english: "The Show Goes On"?

subtitles.original: I know it's hard to say goodbye,
subtitles.english: I know it's hard to say goodbye,

subtitles.original: but before we go,
subtitles.english: but before we go,

subtitles.original: we have some awesome merch to show you!
subtitles.english: we have some awesome merch to show you!

subtitles.original: First up, we have this: the Acrylic Block.
subtitles.english: First up, we have this: the Acrylic Block.

subtitles.original: The illustration theme is Broadway musical-esque retro outfits,
subtitles.english: The illustration theme is Broadway musical-esque retro outfits,

subtitles.original: perfectly fitting for our live show.
subtitles.english: perfectly fitting for our live show.

subtitles.original: And it was drawn by the amazing Aki Akane-sensei.
subtitles.english: And it was drawn by the amazing Aki Akane-sensei.

subtitles.original: It's a two-layer design, giving it a nice depth.
subtitles.english: It's a two-layer design, giving it a nice depth.

subtitles.original: The thick acrylic makes it look great just as it is.
subtitles.english: The thick acrylic makes it look great just as it is.

subtitles.original: Alright, on to the next one!
subtitles.english: Alright, on to the next one!

subtitles.original: Next we have: Collection Cards.
subtitles.english: Next we have: Collection Cards.

subtitles.original: These cards have a special touch with a translucent material
subtitles.english: These cards have a special touch with a translucent material

subtitles.original: and foil stamping, making them feel extra festive.
subtitles.english: and foil stamping, making them feel extra festive.

subtitles.original: Each of us in Myth has our own card,
subtitles.english: Each of us in Myth has our own card,

subtitles.original: so be sure to collect them all.
subtitles.english: so be sure to collect them all.

subtitles.original: Alright, next up!
subtitles.english: Alright, next up!

subtitles.original: Let's see... ooh, we got Mini Mascot Plushies!
subtitles.english: Let's see... ooh, we got Mini Mascot Plushies!

subtitles.original: Each Myth member's mascot has turned into a cute plushie!
subtitles.english: Each Myth member's mascot has turned into a cute plushie!

subtitles.original: But this time, they're all dressed up with hats and ribbons
subtitles.english: But this time, they're all dressed up with hats and ribbons

subtitles.original: to match the live show. How cute!
subtitles.english: to match the live show. How cute!

subtitles.original: And, you can attach them to your bag
subtitles.english: And, you can attach them to your bag

subtitles.original: and take them anywhere you want.
subtitles.english: and take them anywhere you want.

subtitles.original: Let them see the world!
subtitles.english: Let them see the world!

subtitles.original: Okay, what do we have next?
subtitles.english: Okay, what do we have next?

subtitles.original: Next up is the Crossbody Bag.
subtitles.english: Next up is the Crossbody Bag.

subtitles.original: It's a simple everyday-use bum bag.
subtitles.english: It's a simple everyday-use bum bag.

subtitles.original: The inside design features Myth's motif icons,
subtitles.english: The inside design features Myth's motif icons,

subtitles.original: making it super stylish.
subtitles.english: making it super stylish.

subtitles.original: Perfect for carrying the keychains around
subtitles.english: Perfect for carrying the keychains around

subtitles.original: when you go out.
subtitles.english: when you go out.

subtitles.original: Thanks, or should I say, Dankeschön, everyone!
subtitles.english: Thanks, or should I say, Dankeschön, everyone!

subtitles.original: I sure feel like I want to collect them, and I hope you do the same.
subtitles.english: I sure feel like I want to collect them, and I hope you do the same.

subtitles.original: And last but not least,
subtitles.english: And last but not least,

subtitles.original: thank you so much for supporting hololive English -Myth-.
subtitles.english: thank you so much for supporting hololive English -Myth-.

subtitles.original: Come catch us at the next show or stream!
subtitles.english: Come catch us at the next show or stream!

subtitles.original: Otsu-Myth!
subtitles.english: Otsu-Myth!
